price: Isaan sun qajeeluma Gooftaa isaanii irraa ta’e irra jiru. Isaan sun isaanumatu milkaa’oodha.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدٗى مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ulāika ʿalā hudan min rabbihim wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
